div.div: Ohio Wesleyan Univ. vs. Hiram College

tr.td: OWU wins toss and elects to defer. Hiram will defend North goal.
Aaron Port kickoff 55 yards to the HIRF10, Eaton return 16 yards to the HIRF26 (Colton Ponscak; B. Campbell).
